about.title: Hey, I'm a Front-end developer who loves crafting fast and easy to use web applications.
about.body: Passionate about design, web development and open source. A big believer in minimalism and elegant design. I've been working as a Front end developer for 6+ years, designing and developing data driven user interfaces for Healthcare, eCommerce, Product Quality analytics, FX domains and more...
